channel.title: [508] ipban command fixed [508]
channel.description:
I have a created a system for ipbanning in all palidino76 bases (mithscape, rs4ever... etc.) since alot of ppl have requested them. I will put a ipban command in for you.
What you need to have- Some type of server protect, connection manger, socket listener. Teamviewer downloaded and installed from teamviewer.com msn
Add me on msn- chris-0120@live.com and i will code a ipban system for you.
100% credits to me for ths ip system!
